game.name: Japanese Romaji Adventure 3D
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: An RPG where you learn Japanese using romaji (i.e. English letters). It is set in the 1800's and is an epic adventure that will teach you about Japanese history and Japanese language. In a matter of hours you could be speaking Japanese.
game.shortDescriptionEn: An RPG where you learn Japanese using romaji (i.e. English letters). It is set in the 1800's and is an epic adventure that will teach you about Japanese history and Japanese language. In a matter of hours you could be speaking Japanese.
